# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#12)

#### Terez

Do you know the name of the third Blue Sitter that died (in Elaida's coup)?

#### Maria Simons

I have it somewhere in my computer—I am almost positive—but I can never remember it.
